  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2267</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Geologic History</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologische Geschichte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire Géologique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History Geologic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia Geologica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωλογική ιστορία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia Geológica</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animated demonstration of the Geologic History of the earth which illustrates the formation of sedimentary layers of rock through time</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth Science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stratigraphy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine lebhafte Demonstration der geologischen 
Geschichte der Masse, die die Anordnung der sedimentären Schichten 
des Felsens durch Zeit veranschaulicht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une démonstration animée de l'histoire 
géologique de la terre qui illustre la formation des couches 
sédimentaires de roche par le temps</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma demonstração animated do history geologic 
da terra que ilustra a formação de camadas sedimentary de rocha com 
o tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una dimostrazione animata della storia geologica 
della terra che illustra la formazione degli strati sedimentari della 
roccia con tempo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωντανεψοντη επίδειξη της γεωλογικής ιστορίας της 
γης που επεξηγεί το σχηματισμό των ιζηματωδών στρωμάτων του 
βράχου μέσω του χρόνου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una demostración animada de la historia 
geológica de la tierra que ilustra la formación de capas 
sedimentarias de la roca con tiempo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geowissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stratigraphie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
